title: kalakalavena silambasaiyum
sahitya:
kalakalavena silabasaiyum oli kETkudE 


anupallavi

  silu siluvena kATril engO mAyavan varuvadu pOl


caraNam    marakata malaiyum mayakkiDum malar maNamum 
maduvuNDa vanDin oliyum mAdhavan varum nEram idena uraittiDa
			(madhyamakAla)
vaiyagamum vAnagamum onrenet-tOnrudE kANum poruLellAm 
avan kOlamE kaNNan vandiDuvAn ena nambiDum ivvELai tanilE
